title: Hidden Easter Eggs in the Castle Rock Trailer (Stephen King References!)
author: Think Story
comment: 00:10 mark looks like exact house used in Misery film, there's even snow.  When I first saw this trailer my mind jumped to that iconic Misery poster.
I caught most of them, but you found some even I missed. Well done. Subbed.

Stephen King’s multiverse is coming to life!!! ❤️🔥👏  I’m so ready!!!! I pray they hold this up to his standards because a lot of the movies are let downs. They do not keep to the books/novels/novellas story lines. I really want a true SK horror-verse! Ha! 🤓🤡👽☠️🎃👹🕸🕷🦇👩‍💻
Really looking forward to this show! Let me know what I missed!
Okay the scene where you said it reminds you of dream catcher it actually reminded me of Pet Sematary the burial grounds :)
description:
The new trailer for Castle Rock dropped today and it's full of hidden references and easter eggs from dozens of Stephen King novels. In this video I take a look at some of things you might have missed.
